name: Reaper (itch) (Aevek)
description:
This game and all its assets was entirely made by myself in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 52. 

How to Play

Use the cover of the harvest festival of Samhain to quickly gather some souls that seem to have sprouted from the ground. Use your scythe to free the souls from their ghostly form, then pick them up. You can't move on until you've harvested all souls from an area.

Controls

  • WD/Arrow Keys/Gamepad Left Stick to move
  • Space/W/Up/Gamepad A to jump
  • Q/E/Gamepad X/Gamepad B to reap

Tools used

  • Bevy Engine
  • LDtk
  • Aseprite
  • Audacity
  • jsfxr
